assets.icons: Use Lucide React (already installed). Examples: ShieldCheck, Dices, History, Terminal, ChevronDown, ExternalLink

hero.title: PROVABLY FAIR VERIFICATION
hero.subtitle: Don't trust. Verify. Validate every game outcome on RazerBet with cryptographic certainty.

verification_tool.layout: Split view: Left side inputs (Game Type, Server Seed, Client Seed, Nonce), Right side 'Terminal' output showing the calculation steps and final result.

live_feed.title: Live Verification Feed
live_feed.style: Scrolling ticker or dense list showing: Game Icon | User (masked) | Bet Amount | Multiplier | Verification Status (Verified Badge)

how_it_works.style: 3-Step Process Cards: 1. The Seed Pair, 2. The Hash, 3. The Result. Use icons for each step.

universal_guidelines: Implement 'lenis' for smooth scrolling if possible, or standard smooth scroll.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (brightness-125 or scale-105).
Use 'data-testid' on all inputs and buttons.
Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large heading.
Keep the UI 'dense' for the verification tool part - it should feel like a pro tool.
Use the 'orange-red' gradient sparingly as an accent, not a background flood.
